column5: LONDON U.S. nuclear reactor maker Westinghouse does not expect to come out of Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings before the end of 2017 but hopes to complete restructuring in early 2018  its CEO said.

column4: Westinghouse hopes to get out of Chapter 11 in early 2018
column5: LONDON  Sept 15 U.S. nuclear reactor maker Westinghouse does not expect to come out of Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings before the end of this year but hopes to complete its restructuring early next year  its chief executive said.
